price: Kuma suka riƙi gumãka,* baicin Allah, dõmin su kãsance mataimaka a gare su.
arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةٗ لِّيَكُونُواْ لَهُمۡ عِزّٗا
footnotes: * Gunki, shi ne dukan abin bautawa wanda bã Allah ba. Wanda ya riƙi wani sãlihi ko malã'iki ko aljani, yanã bauta masa, to, yã riƙe shi gunki ke nan. Bauta ita ce bin umurni da barin hani. Wanda ya bi umurnin da bã na Allah ba, kõ ya bar abin banin da ba na Allah ba, to, ya bauta wa mai umurnin ko mai hanin, yã riƙe shi gunki baicin Allah.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
